column7: Continuation of FR 103. Comprehensive grammar review with emphasis on oral expression and the continued development of reading and written skills. Completion satisfies graduation requirement in the College of Liberal Arts and Sciences. Students planning to take advanced French courses should take FR 134 in lieu of FR 104. Prerequisite: FR 103 or equivalent, or a placement score showing high school achievement equivalent to FR 103.
column9: Prerequisite: FR 103 or equivalent, or a placement score showing high school achievement equivalent to FR 103.
column11: All students in this course will be required to do language laboratory work outside of class.
